thread.title: Brexit & Beyond: France and Germany at Loggerheads Over Trump Tariff Plan

author: WSJ Staff
title: Brexit & Beyond: France and Germany at Loggerheads Over Trump Tariff Plan
text: To subscribe to the newsletter, please sign up here MUST READS Trump Tariff Plans Drive Wedge Between France and Germany: The European Union’s leading members are at loggerheads over how to react to Washington’s tariff threats, with Germany urging conciliation and France advocating a harder line, according to senior officials. Surprise Fall in Eurozone Inflation Poses Challenge for Stocks to Watch: Tesla, Spotify, Blue Apron, Sprint, Apple, AIG, MetLife, Kraft Heinz, Square, KKR, Fitbit Next WSJ City PM: Europe's Inflation Wait, Commodities' Dollar Headache, Betting on a Faster Fed
